Articles.Content: Im not sure whats changed since i last played on 1.2, but i updated all my mods, and for some reason i cant deploy solar panels. I can click on them all day long and no window shows up, and even when i go into actions in the VAB and select them, theres no option to deploy them, just the panels name, zero options. Did the way the work change, or is something broken in my game?
nevermind. I deleted some of my mods that i wasnt using any parts from and it magically started working.
Kopernicus was the issue for me.
